ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 89
ygData.msgSnippet: I work 40 hours a week, have my own apartment, my own car, loan, bills, I go to night school aswell and I play maybe 2-3 hours a night....so about 15 hours a
ygData.messageBody:
I work 40 hours a week, have my own apartment, my own car, loan, bills, I
go to night school aswell and I play maybe 2-3 hours a night....so about
15 hours a week...

That won't get me a pait of JBoots, or BIBS, or BIC...or any rubicite or
anything....but you know what I do....I just enjoy the game. So WHAT if
you can't have an item you want. Tough shit....really people....sure the
item may be cool....but it's not the end all and be all of your
character.....please.....quite bitching about camping. I don't camp,
can't camp....and don't care if others do. If they want to stay up 18
straight hours....then let them....this is a game after all....there are
other things going on in the world.

As far as items not being on a MoB all the time. Well...that would make
SoW from a shaman or druid...not very special....that would make that
special weapon not so special anymore. That would make the 10-40 hour
wait to get the PGT that much less special. If you want to power through
the game...get all the best weapons and armor easily and not have to work
at all to get em....then go play UO. I don't want to see everyone running
around with JBoots...wielding PGT's and Darkewood shields....

~S

p.s. power leveling, stupidity and camping will thin out rather
soon....seeing as highschool/college are starting rather soon.....relax
people....plenty of items in the game that we know of....and plenty more
that we don't know about.
